--- # Government Tender Announcement **Invitation to Bid: RISO - Halon Systems Services** ## Introduction The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the provision of Halon systems services. The Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) is a procurement arrangement designed to provide ongoing support for the repair, installation, and maintenance of Halon systems on Canadian Government vessels. ## Contract Details * **Contract Number**: W3554-246367 * **Publication Date**: June 11, 2024 * **Closing Date**: June 26, 2024 @ 2:00 PM (Eastern Time) * **Contract Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RSO) * **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding ## Scope of Work The RISO contract is required to provide services for the repair, installation, removal, inspection, retrofit, relocation, testing, and evacuation of Halon systems and deficiencies onboard Canadian Government vessels. The services will be performed on an as-and-when-required basis within the Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia. ## Expected Deliverables Successful contractors will be required to: * Provide services to repair, instal, inspect, test, and evacuate Halon systems on Canadian Government vessels * Meet specific safety and performance standards * Collaborate with the DND to develop project plans and schedules ## Evaluation Criteria The bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price offered by the contractor. ## Additional Information * This RSO is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) * Contractors are required to submit a comprehensive bid package, including all necessary documentation and supporting information ## Contact Information For more information, please contact: Dale Wadden, PSPC - SPAC dale.wadden@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca Note: The original text has been rephrased and reformatted to improve clarity, concision, and readability.
